name: Audie Drummer
description:
Audie Drummer is a drumming app that mimics the drumming mode in Rhythm Tengoku (Rhythm Heaven) for the Nintendo Game Boy Advance. It stars Audie from Animal Crossing, who sports a fancy black dress for the occasion. Select from 14 high quality drum kits created with the Korg Gadget VST, and drum to your favorite music!

Audie Dummer is specifically designed to be played on Windows with a Dualshock 4. Keyboard input is also supported. The layout provided by the Dualshock 4 allows your drumming skills to directly transfer to Rhythm Tengoku on the Game Boy Advance. All animations in the game are 144 fps.

Press L3 or Tab in the app to view the controls.
